Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Troy in 1969...
Had first career hit on 4/14/1970, off Harold Spiker (SYR)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/23/1970, off Gabriel Nielsen (PIL)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Gashouse on 7/5/1973...
Traded from Troy to Pittsburgh on 2/5/1974 (Going to TRO: SS R. Pippins, P C. Vieira. Going to PIT: LF D. Brown)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Plum Grove on 7/30/1974...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Boston (FBA) on 7/10/1978...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1978...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Boston (UBA) on 1/31/1979 (Going to PIL: LF D. Brown, 3B M. Tate, P J. Santana. Going to PIT: 1B J. Castle)...
Drove in 6 runs against Lynchburg on 7/26/1979...
Injured on 4/14/1980 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 6/20/1982...
